pr_title: Fix param converter handling in RESTEasyReactive

timeline.message:
Fix param converter handling in RR

Fixes: #13780

Fix param converter handling in RR

Fixes: #13780

Convert NotFoundExceptionMapper to annotation style

This make it possible to avoid having to retrieve the
header from the Arc Request Context

timeline.bodyText: I must be thick, but I don't see where that is wired in by the processor?
timeline.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText:
Good point! It had already been wired up: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/master/extensions/resteasy-reactive/quarkus-resteasy-reactive/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/resteasy/reactive/server/deployment/ResteasyReactiveScanningProcessor.java#L321
I had just forgot to add the method :)
replies.author: geoand
